full_summary:
### Aviation Replacement Parts Tender

#### General Information

* **Reference Number**: PW22-01003585
* **Publication Date**: August 8, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 23, 2022, 2:00 PM EDT

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Title:** Aviation Replacement Parts
* **GSIN/NAICS:** 5930 - Switches
* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding

#### Contract Terms

This Notice of Proposed Procurement is issued by the Department of National Defence for the provision of Aviation Replacement Parts. Bidders are invited to submit a Proposal in either English or French.

The Crown has a requirement for the following items:

* Boot, Dust and Moisture Seal, Supply No.: 6035-0059-01, NCAGE: 17472
	+ Quantity: 60
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ Delivery Location: 7 CFSD Edmonton, FCA Free Carrier

Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the part number and NCAGE within their Proposal.

**Downloadable Documents**

 Documents may be downloaded from the following links:

* [English RFP Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/08/22683a1b3469e1938ba75928d29e8960/rfp_w8485-205753b_eng.pdf)
* [French RFP Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/08/202ae092beecee4f1098a3d8bb6ea19e/hpr_-_w8485-205753b_-_rfp_fr.pdf)

#### Contact

#### Trade Agreements
This procurement is governed by several trade agreements, including:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-P
